'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2); var statusCell = '' + statusText + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + customerCell + '' + '' + dateCell + '' + '' + dueDateCell + '' + '' + totalCell + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); }); } function renderInvoicesMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('invoicesMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredInvoices = getFilteredInvoices(); container.innerHTML = ''; filteredInvoices.forEach(function(invoice) { var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var statusClass = 'status-' + invoice.status; var statusText = getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(invoice.status); var header = '
' + '
#' + invoice.id + ' - ' + invoice.customerName + '
' + '' + statusText + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Data
' + '
' + formatDateUS(invoice.invoiceDate) + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Vencimento
' + '
' + formatDateUS(invoice.dueDate) + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Total
' + '
// Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); }); } function getFilteredInvoices() { var filtered = invoices; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('invoiceSearch') ? document.getElementById('invoiceSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('invoiceStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('invoiceStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filtered = filtered.filter(function(invoice) { return invoice.customerName.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || invoice.id.toString().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (statusFilter) { filtered = filtered.filter(function(invoice) { return invoice.status === statusFilter; }); } return filtered; } function filterInvoices() { renderInvoicesTable(); renderInvoicesMobile(); } function updateInvoicesSummary() { document.getElementById('totalInvoices').textContent = invoices.length; document.getElementById('pendingInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'pending'; }).length; document.getElementById('paidInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'paid'; }).length; document.getElementById('overdueInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'overdue'; }).length; } function editInvoice(invoiceId) { openInvoiceModal(invoiceId); } function viewInvoice(invoiceId) { var invoice = invoices.find(function(i) { return i.id === invoiceId; }); if (invoice) { alert('Detalhes da Fatura #' + invoice.id + ':\n\nCliente: ' + invoice.customerName + '\nData: ' + formatDateUS(invoice.invoiceDate) + '\nVencimento: ' + formatDateUS(invoice.dueDate) + '\nTotal: // Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2) + '\nStatus: ' + getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(invoice.status)); } } function getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(status) { switch(status) { case 'pending': return 'Pendente'; case 'paid': return 'Pago'; case 'overdue': return 'Vencido'; default: return status; } } function formatDateUS(dateString) { var date = new Date(dateString); return (date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0') + '/' + date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0') + '/' + date.getFullYear(); } // Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + value.toLocaleString('en-US'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); updateInvoicesSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2); var statusCell = '' + statusText + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + customerCell + '' + '' + dateCell + '' + '' + dueDateCell + '' + '' + totalCell + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); }); } function renderInvoicesMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('invoicesMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredInvoices = getFilteredInvoices(); container.innerHTML = ''; filteredInvoices.forEach(function(invoice) { var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var statusClass = 'status-' + invoice.status; var statusText = getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(invoice.status); var header = '
' + '
#' + invoice.id + ' - ' + invoice.customerName + '
' + '' + statusText + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Data
' + '
' + formatDateUS(invoice.invoiceDate) + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Vencimento
' + '
' + formatDateUS(invoice.dueDate) + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Total
' + '
// Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2) + '
' + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); }); } function getFilteredInvoices() { var filtered = invoices; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('invoiceSearch') ? document.getElementById('invoiceSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('invoiceStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('invoiceStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filtered = filtered.filter(function(invoice) { return invoice.customerName.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || invoice.id.toString().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (statusFilter) { filtered = filtered.filter(function(invoice) { return invoice.status === statusFilter; }); } return filtered; } function filterInvoices() { renderInvoicesTable(); renderInvoicesMobile(); } function updateInvoicesSummary() { document.getElementById('totalInvoices').textContent = invoices.length; document.getElementById('pendingInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'pending'; }).length; document.getElementById('paidInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'paid'; }).length; document.getElementById('overdueInvoices').textContent = invoices.filter(function(i) { return i.status === 'overdue'; }).length; } function editInvoice(invoiceId) { openInvoiceModal(invoiceId); } function viewInvoice(invoiceId) { var invoice = invoices.find(function(i) { return i.id === invoiceId; }); if (invoice) { alert('Detalhes da Fatura #' + invoice.id + ':\n\nCliente: ' + invoice.customerName + '\nData: ' + formatDateUS(invoice.invoiceDate) + '\nVencimento: ' + formatDateUS(invoice.dueDate) + '\nTotal: // Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); + invoice.total.toFixed(2) + '\nStatus: ' + getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(invoice.status)); } } function getInvoiceStatusDisplayName(status) { switch(status) { case 'pending': return 'Pendente'; case 'paid': return 'Pago'; case 'overdue': return 'Vencido'; default: return status; } } function formatDateUS(dateString) { var date = new Date(dateString); return (date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0') + '/' + date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0') + '/' + date.getFullYear(); } // Modal functions function openCustomerModal(customerId) { currentEditingId = customerId || null; if (customerId) { // Edit mode var customer = customers.find(function(c) { return c.id === customerId; }); if (customer) { document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Editar Cliente'; populateCustomerForm(customer); } } else { // New customer mode document.getElementById('customerModalTitle').textContent = 'Novo Cliente'; clearCustomerForm(); } document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeCustomerModal() { document.getElementById('customerModal').style.display = 'none'; currentEditingId = null; clearCustomerForm(); } function toggleCustomerType() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var individualFields = document.getElementById('individualFields'); var businessFields = document.getElementById('businessFields'); if (type === 'individual') { individualFields.style.display = 'block'; businessFields.style.display = 'none'; } else { individualFields.style.display = 'none'; businessFields.style.display = 'block'; } } function clearCustomerForm() { document.getElementById('customerForm').reset(); document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="individual"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); } function populateCustomerForm(customer) { // Set customer type document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"][value="' + customer.type + '"]').checked = true; toggleCustomerType(); if (customer.type === 'individual') { document.getElementById('firstName').value = customer.firstName || ''; document.getElementById('lastName').value = customer.lastName || ''; document.getElementById('cpf').value = customer.taxId || ''; } else { document.getElementById('companyName').value = customer.companyName || ''; document.getElementById('contactName').value = customer.contactName || ''; document.getElementById('cnpj').value = customer.taxId || ''; } document.getElementById('customerEmail').value = customer.email || ''; document.getElementById('customerPhone').value = customer.phone || ''; if (customer.address) { document.getElementById('customerCep').value = customer.address.cep || ''; document.getElementById('customerAddress').value = customer.address.street || ''; document.getElementById('customerNumber').value = customer.address.number || ''; document.getElementById('customerComplement').value = customer.address.complement || ''; document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value = customer.address.district || ''; document.getElementById('customerCity').value = customer.address.city || ''; document.getElementById('customerState').value = customer.address.state || ''; } document.getElementById('customerStatus').value = customer.status || 'active'; document.getElementById('creditLimit').value = customer.creditLimit ? customer.creditLimit.replace('R$ ', '').replace('.', '').replace(',', '.') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'À vista'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { cep: document.getElementById('customerCep').value, street: document.getElementById('customerAddress').value, number: document.getElementById('customerNumber').value, complement: document.getElementById('customerComplement').value, district: document.getElementById('customerDistrict').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: 'R$ ' + document.getElementById('creditLimit').value, paymentTerms: document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value }; if (type === 'individual') { customer.firstName = document.getElementById('firstName').value; customer.lastName = document.getElementById('lastName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cpf').value; } else { customer.companyName = document.getElementById('companyName').value; customer.contactName = document.getElementById('contactName').value; customer.taxId = document.getElementById('cnpj').value; } // Validation if (!customer.email || !customer.phone || !customer.taxId) { alert('Por favor, preencha todos os campos obrigatórios.'); return; } if (currentEditingId) { // Update existing customer var index = customers.findIndex(function(c) { return c.id === currentEditingId; }); if (index !== -1) { customer.id = currentEditingId; customers[index] = customer; alert('Cliente atualizado com sucesso!'); } } else { // Add new customer customer.id = customers.length > 0 ? Math.max.apply(Math, customers.map(function(c) { return c.id; })) + 1 : 1; customers.push(customer); alert('Cliente salvo com sucesso!'); } closeCustomerModal(); renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); updateCustomersSummary(); } function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '
' + '
Tipo
' + '
' + '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + '' + '
' + '
' + '
Documento
' + '
' + customer.taxId + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
E-mail
' + '
' + customer.email + '
' + '
' + '
' + '
Telefone
' + '
' + customer.phone + '
' + '
'; var actions = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; card.innerHTML = header + body + actions; container.appendChild(card); } } // Edit customer function editCustomer(customerId) { openCustomerModal(customerId); } // View customer function viewCustomer(customerId) { var customer = null; for (var i = 0; i < customers.length; i++) { if (customers[i].id === customerId) { customer = customers[i]; break; } } if (customer) { var address = customer.address ? customer.address.street + ', ' + customer.address.number + ' - ' + customer.address.city + '/' + customer.address.state : 'Não informado'; alert('Detalhes do Cliente:\n\nNome: ' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '\nE-mail: ' + customer.email + '\nTelefone: ' + customer.phone + '\nEndereço: ' + address + '\nStatus: ' + (customer.status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo')); } } // Get type display name in Portuguese function getTypeDisplayName(type) { return type === 'business' ? 'Pessoa Jurídica' : 'Pessoa Física'; } // Get status display name in Portuguese function getStatusDisplayName(status) { return status === 'active' ? 'Ativo' : 'Inativo'; } // Initialize charts function initializeCharts() { // Revenue vs Expenses Chart var revenueCtx = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(revenueCtx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: ['Jan', 'Fev', 'Mar', 'Abr', 'Mai', 'Jun'], datasets: [{ label: 'Receitas', data: [7500, 8200, 7800, 8500, 9100, 8500], borderColor: '#27ae60', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }, { label: 'Despesas', data: [5200, 5800, 5400, 6200, 6500, 6200], borderColor: '#e74c3c', backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)', tension: 0.4 }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { callback: function(value) { return 'R$ ' + value.toLocaleString('pt-BR'); } } } } } }); // Expense Categories Chart var expenseCtx = document.getElementById('expenseChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(expenseCtx, { type: 'doughnut', data: { labels: ['Aluguel', 'Energia', 'Material', 'Marketing', 'Outros'], datasets: [{ data: [2500, 800, 1200, 1000, 700], backgroundColor: [ '#3498db', '#e74c3c', '#f39c12', '#27ae60', '#9b59b6' ] }] }, options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', } } } }); } // Add utility classes document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { updateCustomersSummary(); }); , '').replace(',', '') : ''; document.getElementById('paymentTerms').value = customer.paymentTerms || 'Net 30'; } function saveCustomer() { var type = document.querySelector('input[name="customerType"]:checked').value; var customer = { type: type, email: document.getElementById('customerEmail').value, phone: document.getElementById('customerPhone').value, address: { line1: document.getElementById('customerAddress1').value, line2: document.getElementById('customerAddress2').value, city: document.getElementById('customerCity').value, state: document.getElementById('customerState').value, zipCode: document.getElementById('customerZip').value }, status: document.getElementById('customerStatus').value, creditLimit: ' function updateCustomersSummary() { document.getElementById('totalCustomers').textContent = customers.length; document.getElementById('activeCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.status === 'active'; }).length; document.getElementById('businessCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'business'; }).length; document.getElementById('individualCustomers').textContent = customers.filter(function(c) { return c.type === 'individual'; }).length; } // Get filtered customers function getFilteredCustomers() { var filteredCustomers = customers; var searchTerm = document.getElementById('customerSearch') ? document.getElementById('customerSearch').value.toLowerCase() : ''; var typeFilter = document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerTypeFilter').value : ''; var statusFilter = document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter') ? document.getElementById('customerStatusFilter').value : ''; if (searchTerm) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return getCustomerDisplayName(customer).toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.email.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1 || customer.taxId.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm) !== -1; }); } if (typeFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.type === typeFilter; }); } if (statusFilter) { filteredCustomers = filteredCustomers.filter(function(customer) { return customer.status === statusFilter; }); } return filteredCustomers; } // Filter customers function filterCustomers() { renderCustomersTable(); renderCustomersMobile(); } // Render customers table function renderCustomersTable() { var tbody = document.getElementById('customersTableBody'); if (!tbody) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); tbody.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var row = document.createElement('tr'); var nameCell = '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '
' + formatAddress(customer.address) + '
'; var typeCell = '' + getTypeDisplayName(customer.type) + ''; var statusCell = '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + ''; var actionsCell = '
' + '' + '' + '
'; row.innerHTML = '' + nameCell + '' + '' + typeCell + '' + '' + customer.taxId + '' + '' + customer.email + '' + '' + customer.phone + '' + '' + statusCell + '' + '' + actionsCell + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); } } // Render customers mobile function renderCustomersMobile() { var container = document.getElementById('customersMobileCards'); if (!container) return; var filteredCustomers = getFilteredCustomers(); container.innerHTML = ''; for (var i = 0; i < filteredCustomers.length; i++) { var customer = filteredCustomers[i]; var card = document.createElement('div'); card.className = 'mobile-card'; var header = '
' + '
' + getCustomerDisplayName(customer) + '
' + '' + getStatusDisplayName(customer.status) + '' + '
'; var body = '
' + '

' + '

' + '
